error.msg: Using 'memcpy' on struct that contains a 'std::atomic'.
error.verbose: Using 'memcpy' on struct that contains a 'std::atomic' is unsafe, because constructor, destructor and copy operator calls are omitted. These are necessary for this non-POD type to ensure that a valid object is created.
